00009 //  config for libstdc++ v2 (packaged with gcc 2.96, RHAS21 or RH7.x)
00010 //  not much to go in here:
00011 
00012 #define LIBSMBIOS_STDLIB "GNU libstdc++ version < 3 (cannot autodetect)."
00013 
00014 // forward compat for newer names
00015 // GCC 2.96 has only ios, but the std says it has been renamed to ios_base
00016 #if __GNUC__ < 3
00017 #   define ios_base ios
00018 #endif
00019
